title: Bug 131250Parameter value set in runtime should be kept until close the preview viewer.
EB: Bug 131250Parameter value set in runtime should be kept until close the preview viewer. Description:Parameter value set in runtime should be kept until close the preview viewer.Steps to reproduce:1. Go to the next page and click the label link.Expected result:The first page appears.Actual result:The parameter dialog appeared.
SR: New a parameter p1 without default value, drag it to Layout.2. Insert a label behind p1, set pageBreakBefore to always, hyperlink to p1 bookmark.4. Preview in Web Viewer and input p1 value.5.
